com.mapquest.android.maps
Class MapController

java.lang.Object
  com.mapquest.android.maps.MapController
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.view.View.OnKeyListener
public final class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.view.View.OnKeyListener

An helper class to control map actions like panning, zooming and map animations.

Method Detail

animateTo

public void animateTo(GeoPoint point)
Animates the panning of map to the point

Parameters:
point - the geoPoint to which panning of map should be animated

animateTo

public void animateTo(GeoPoint point,
                      android.os.Message message)
Animates the panning of map to the point and dispatches the message to its target upon completion.

Parameters:
point - the geoPoint to which panning of map should be animated
message - the message that should be dispatched to its target

animateTo

public void animateTo(GeoPoint point,
                      java.lang.Runnable runnable)
Animates the panning of map to the point and executes the Runnable object within the main UI thread upon completioj.

Parameters:
point - the geoPoint to which panning of map should be animated
runnable - the runnable object that should be dispatched to its target

animateRotation

public void animateRotation(float rotationDegrees)
Animates the rotation of map to given angle in degrees

Parameters:
rotationDegrees - the target angle in degrees where 0 degree being north.

onKey

public boolean onKey(android.view.View view,
                     int keyCode,
                     android.view.KeyEvent event)
Currently does nothing. To handle map actions override MapView.onKeyDown(int, KeyEvent) or MapView.onKeyUp(int, KeyEvent) or use View.setOnKeyListener(OnKeyListener)

Specified by:
onKey in interface android.view.View.OnKeyListener

scrollBy

public void scrollBy(int x,
                     int y)
Scrolls the map by given amount of pixels in x and y axis. This does not animates the panning of map.

Parameters:
x - the amount of x pixels that should be scrolled.
y - the amount of y pixels that should be scrolled.

setCenter

public void setCenter(GeoPoint point)
Set the center point of the map.

Parameters:
point - the geoPoint to which map should be centered.

setZoom

public void setZoom(int zoomLevel)
Set the zoom level of the map.

Parameters:
zoomLevel - the zoom level

setMapRotation

public void setMapRotation(float rotationDegrees)
Rotates the maps to given angle in degrees and auto adjusts the height and width of the map after rotation. UseMapView.getMapWidth() and MapView.getMapHeight() to find adjusted width and height of the map.

Parameters:
rotationDegrees - the target angle in degrees where 0 degree being north.

stopAnimation

public void stopAnimation(boolean jumpToFinish)
Stops all the animations currently running and optionally finishes the animation graciously

Parameters:
jumpToFinish - a boolean flag to signals animations to end graciously.

stopPanning

public void stopPanning()
Stops the panning animation of map with the current state.

zoomIn

public boolean zoomIn()
Zooms in map by one level.

Returns:
false if zoom in is not possible.

zoomInFixing

public boolean zoomInFixing(int xPixel,
                            int yPixel)
Zooms in the map by one zoom level at the desired screen location.

Parameters:
xPixel - the x pixel in screen where it should be zoomed in to.
yPixel - the y pixel in screen where it should be zoomed in to.
Returns:
false if zoom in is not possible

zoomOut

public boolean zoomOut()
Zooms out by one level.

Returns:
false if zoom out is not possible

zoomOutFixing

public boolean zoomOutFixing(int xPixel,
                             int yPixel)
Zooms out the map by one zoom level at the desired screen location.

Parameters:
xPixel - the x pixel in screen where it should be zoomed out to.
yPixel - the y pixel in screen where it should be zoomed out to.
Returns:
false if zoom out is not possible

zoomToSpan

public void zoomToSpan(int latSpanE6,
                       int lonSpanE6)
Sets correct zoom level to best fit bounding box

Parameters:
latSpanE6 - latitude span to fit
lonSpanE6 - longitude span to fit

zoomToSpan

public void zoomToSpan(BoundingBox bbox)
Sets correct map center and zoom level to best fit latSpanE6 and longSpanE6

Parameters:
bbox - the bounding to best fit
